text: Lollia Paulina (15 - 49 AD)A bit of History â€“ Lollia Paullina . was an empress in the Roman Empire. She was the wife of Caligula.Aut. E. Groag, A. Stein, L. Petersen - e.a. (edd.), Prosopographia Imperii Romani saeculi I, II et III, Berlin, 1933-x, L 308. (PIR2) Pliny the Elder mentions Paulina to show Roman ostentation.Pliny the Elder, Natural History, 9.117 ==References== Category:15 births Category:49 deaths
